messages.title: Winning Back the Future for Derby North
messages.content: Labour pledges investment in the NHS services at the point of need and to end the failed privatisation of our National Health Service

messages.title: A million more homes to be built
messages.content: Labour wants to end the failed privatisation of our National Health Service.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour promises to scrap tuition fees and reintroduce maintenance allowances.
Labour aims to tackle the Tory housing crisis that is segregating our communities, by building homes for the many, not investment opportunities for the few.
Labour pledges investment in the NHS services at the point of need and to end the failed privatisation of our National Health Service.
